channel.title: Where are you going?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Well, the other day Wetdreams and I were talking about where we were going after we died. I think it was last week. We both said we didn't want to go to hell and I said I wanted to get to heaven do or die. I might of been taking those words lightly then, but for awhile I've been dwelling on that thought. Where am I going? So the question from me to you is where are you going? And why are you going to where your going. I believe I'm going to heaven because i believe in God and Jesus (and that he died for us, etc, etc).

item.title: Where are you going?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Exactly amy.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are you going?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:15, topic:429082”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=531774.msg3886011#msg3886011 date=1326435345]
Do you know how fuckjng hard it is to make a desision in you life and not regret something in your whole entire life lol. I already have like 5 things I regret deeply and I’m 15 :p. anyways I believe in heaven. Not here to debate any beliefs, I mean… Religion is the #1 cause of fights and even sometimes war. I respect everyone’s perspective as long as no one puts mine down
[/quote]
The point is, is to not regret that decision. As life goes on and there’s nothing you can do about that regret.[/quote]
Decisions shape your future, and regreting your past means you regret your future. Not a great way to live in my opinion, just think if you hadn’t made that one decision some good things in your future would not happen.

@Andrew Because then i can post them on all my porn sites i own, gotta keep the business going.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are you going?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:14, topic:429082”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=531774.msg3886005#msg3886005 date=1326434466]

I will be one of the hairs on Robin William’s leg.

Just don’t look up.

What a non sense thing to say, I wont have eyes. Just a deep connection with the movie Ms Doubtfire.

You don’t know that, you’ve never been one before.

I love that movie, was amazing!

How do you know that! That what I was before I was a people, I can’t wait to go back to the mother land! Lol

[/quote]

Pics or it didn’t happen.[/quote]
How come you always want pictures of me doing something?

Read full topic

item.title: Where are you going?

@the_wanderer wrote:

Dunder Mifflin:

Do you know how fuckjng hard it is to make a desision in you life and not regret something in your whole entire life lol. I already have like 5 things I regret deeply and I’m 15 :p. anyways I believe in heaven. Not here to debate any beliefs, I mean… Religion is the #1 cause of fights and even sometimes war. I respect everyone’s perspective as long as no one puts mine down

The point is, is to not regret that decision. As life goes on and there’s nothing you can do about that regret.

item.title: Where are you going?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:9, topic:429082”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=531774.msg3885993#msg3885993 date=1326433640]

I will be one of the hairs on Robin William’s leg.

Just don’t look up.

What a non sense thing to say, I wont have eyes. Just a deep connection with the movie Ms Doubtfire.
[/quote]
You don’t know that, you’ve never been one before.

I love that movie, was amazing![/quote]
How do you know that! That what I was before I was a people, I can’t wait to go back to the mother land! Lol

The Wanderer:

Live life with no regrets and you’ll be fine.

Ill remember that when I’m in the forest chasing people.
